Primal Bond.name: 原初联结
Primal Bond.description:
将你的熟练加值加到野兽进行的一切属性检定和豁免检定上。

Foundry贴士

此加值已包含于野兽的全局加值中。

Beast’s Strike.name: 野兽打击
Beast’s Strike.description:
近战攻击检定：加值等于你的法术攻击加值，触及 5 尺。命中： 1d8 + 2 + 你的感知调整值穿刺、挥砍或钝击伤害（于召唤时选择）。若野兽在此次攻击前立即向着该目标直线移动了至少 20 尺，则其额外受到 1d6 与攻击伤害类型相同的伤害，若目标体型不超过巨型，则其还会陷入倒地 &Reference[prone] 状态。

Foundry贴士

此攻击和冲锋攻击活动允许你在掷骰对话框中选择伤害类型。你应当选择一种伤害类型，并且直至你重新召唤你的行侣为止一直使用那种类型的伤害。

冲锋攻击活动包含了额外伤害。

此外，这两项活动均可以选择力场作为其伤害类型，但只应在你到达 7 级并获得 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrExceptiona]{特效训练}特性后才能选择。

Amphibious.name: 水陆两栖
Amphibious.description: 野兽能在空气和水中呼吸。

Primal Bond.name: 原初联结
Primal Bond.description:
将你的熟练加值加到野兽进行的一切属性检定和豁免检定上。

Foundry Note

该加值已经包含在野兽的全局加值中。

Beast’s Strike.name: 野兽打击
Beast’s Strike.description:
近战攻击检定： 加值等于你的法术攻击加值，触及 5 尺。命中：1d6 + 2 + 你的感知调整值钝击或穿刺伤害（于召唤时选择），且目标陷入 &Reference[grappled] 状态（逃脱DC等于你的法术豁免DC）。

Foundry Note

攻击行动将允许您在掷骰对话框中选择伤害类型。你应该选择一种伤害类型，并持续使用它，直到重新召唤你的行侣。

此外，它们有力量作为伤害掷骰属性，只有当你到达 7 级并获得 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrExceptiona]{特效训练} 特性时才应该使用。

Flyby.name: 飞掠
Flyby.description: 野兽飞行离开敌人的触及时不会引发借机攻击。

Primal Bond.name: 原初联结
Primal Bond.description:
将你的熟练加值加到野兽进行的一切属性检定和豁免检定上。

Foundry Note

该加值已经包含在野兽的全局加值中。

Beast’s Strike.name: 野兽打击
Beast’s Strike.description:
近战攻击检定： 加值等于你的法术攻击加值，触及 5 尺。命中： 1d4 + 3 + 你的感知调整值挥砍伤害。

Foundry Note

攻击 行动将允许您在掷骰对话框中选择伤害类型。你应该选择一种伤害类型，并持续使用它，直到重新召唤你的行侣。

此外，它们有力量作为伤害掷骰属性，只有当你到达7级并获得 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrExceptiona]{特效训练} 特性时才应该使用。

Initial Save.name: 初次豁免
Initial Save.condition: 一个你能看见的生物进入精魄的空间或在距离精魄 5 尺范围内开始其回合

Save while Restrained.name: 束缚时豁免
Save while Restrained.condition: 一个你能看见的生物进入精魄的空间或在距离精魄 5 尺范围内开始其回合

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description: 在精魂 5 尺内开始其回合时，若没有生物被精魂束缚，施法者可以迫使其进行一次 [[/save ability=dex]] 豁免。失败则目标受到 8d8 的对应精魂类型的伤害并且直到法术结束为止，目标处于 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态。在处于束缚状态的目标回合开始时，其重新豁免，失败则目标受到 4d8 的对应精魂类型的伤害，豁免成功则目标不再被精魂束缚。

Pack Damage.name: 集群伤害
Pack Damage.description: 只要该集群移动到你所能看到的生物 10 尺范围内，或者只要你所能看到的生物进入集群 10 尺范围内的空间，或者在该空间结束其回合时，你就能迫使该生物进行一次敏捷豁免。豁免失败的话，该生物会受到 3d10 点挥砍伤害。每个回合，该生物只能进行一次此类豁免。

save.condition: 所能看到的生物进入集群 10 尺范围内的空间

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description:
灵魄发动等于法术环阶一半次数的攻击（向下取整）。

[[floor(@flags.dnd5e.summon.level / 2)]]{攻击次数}

[[floor(@flags.dnd5e.summon.level / 2)]]{攻击次数}

Whispering Aura.name: 低语灵光
Whispering Aura.description: 只要灵魄并未失能，它就会在自己的每个回合开始时释放出灵能能量。感知豁免：DC等于你的法术豁免DC，灵魄 5 尺内的每个生物（除你之外）。失败：2d6 心灵伤害

Death Throes.name: 焚身爆
Death Throes.description:
当灵魄生命值降值 0 时，或是法术结束时，灵魄会爆炸。

敏捷豁免：DC等于你的法术豁免DC，以灵魄为源点 10 尺光环区域内的每个生物。

失败：2d10 + 法术环阶的火焰伤害。

Explode.name: 爆炸
Explode.condition: 当灵魄生命值降值 0 时，或是法术结束时

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: 灵魄为抵抗法术和其他魔法效应而作的豁免检定具有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description:
灵魄发动等于法术环阶一半次数的攻击（向下取整）。

[[floor(@flags.dnd5e.summon.level / 2)]]{攻击次数}

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: 近战攻击检定：加值等于你的法术攻击加值，触及 5 尺。命中：1d12 + 3 + 法术环阶的暗蚀伤害。

Devil’s Sight.name: 魔鬼视界
Devil’s Sight.description: 魔法黑暗不会阻碍灵魄的黑暗视觉。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: 灵魄为抵抗法术和其他魔法效应而作的豁免检定具有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description:
灵魄发动等于法术环阶一半次数的攻击（向下取整）。

[[floor(@flags.dnd5e.summon.level / 2)]]{攻击次数}

Fiery Strike.name: 狂焰袭
Fiery Strike.description: 近战或远程攻击检定：加值等于你的法术攻击加值，触及 5 尺或射程 150 尺。命中：2d6 + 3 + 法术环阶的火焰伤害。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: 灵魄为抵抗法术和其他魔法效应而作的豁免检定具有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description:
灵魄发动等于法术环阶一半次数的攻击（向下取整）。

[[floor(@flags.dnd5e.summon.level / 2)]]{攻击次数}

Claws.name: 爪击
Claws.description: 近战攻击检定 命中采取你的法术攻击调整值，触及 5 尺。 命中： 1d8 + 3 + 法术环数的挥砍伤害。发动攻击后，邪魔可以魔法性地传送至一处 30 尺内其可见且未被占据的空间。

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: 巨虫能够在困难表面上攀爬，包括倒吊在天花板上，而不需要进行属性检定。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description:
巨虫发动等同于法术环数一半的次数的攻击（向下取整）。

[[floor(@flags.dnd5e.summon.level / 2)]]{攻击次数}

Poison Jab.name: 猛毒刺
Poison Jab.description: 近战攻击检定：加值等同于你的法术攻击调整值，触及 10 尺。命中：1d6 + 3 + 法术环阶点穿刺伤害+1d4点毒素伤害。

Venomous Spew.name: 剧毒喷涌
Venomous Spew.description: 体质豁免：你的法术豁免难度等级，一只巨虫在 10 尺内能看见的生物。失败：目标会处于 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态，直至巨虫下一轮开始。

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 你会处于 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态，直至巨虫下一轮开始。

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行

Web Bolt.name: 蛛网箭
Web Bolt.description: 远程攻击检定：加值等同于你的法术攻击调整值，射程 60 尺。命中：1d10 + 3 + 法术环阶点钝击伤害，且目标直到巨虫的下个回合开始为止速度降为 0。

Webbed.name: 落网
Webbed.description: 你直到巨虫的下个回合开始为止速度降为 0。

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行

灵魄发动等于法术环阶一半次数的攻击（向下取整）。

Poison Jab.description: 近战攻击检定：加值等同于你的法术攻击调整值，触及 10 尺。命中：1d6 + 3 + 法术环阶点穿刺伤害 + 1d4 点毒素伤害。

Slam.name: 猛击

Slam.description: 近战攻击检定：加值等于你的法术攻击调整值，触及 5 尺。命中：2d6 + 3 + 你的施法调整值的力场伤害。

Slam.name: 猛击
Slam.description: 近战攻击检定：加值等于你的法术攻击调整值，触及 5 尺。命中：1d4 + 3 力场伤害。

Regeneration.name: 再生
Regeneration.description: 灵魄在其回合开始时恢复 [[/healing 5]]{5 点生命值} ，前提是它至少有 1 点生命值。

heal.condition: 在其回合开始时，如果它至少有 1 点生命值

Whispering Aura.name: 低语灵光
Whispering Aura.description: 只要灵魄并未失能，它就会在自己的每个回合开始时释放出灵能能量。感知豁免：DC等于你的法术豁免DC，灵魄 5 尺内的每个生物（除你之外）。失败：2d6 心灵伤害。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description:
灵魄发动等于法术环阶一半次数的攻击（向下取整）。

[[floor(@flags.dnd5e.summon.level / 2)]]{攻击次数}

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description: 近战攻击检定：加值等于你的法术攻击加值，触及 5 尺。命中：1d10 + 3 + 法术环阶的挥砍伤害，目标无法恢复生命值直至灵魄的下一回合开始。

Eye Ray.name: 眼波射线
Eye Ray.description: 远程攻击检定：加值等于你的法术攻击加值，射程 150 尺。命中：1d8+3+法术环阶的心灵伤害。

Psychic Slam.name: 灵能猛击
Psychic Slam.description: 近战攻击检定：加值等于你的法术攻击加值，触及 5 尺。命中：1d8 + 3 + 法术环阶的心灵伤害。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 猿发动两次 [[/item 拳击]] 攻击。

Fist.name: 拳击
Fist.description: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：5（1d4 + 3）钝击伤害。

Rock.name: 投石
Rock.description: 远程攻击检定：+5，射程 25/50 尺。命中：10（2d6 + 3）钝击伤害。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: 近战攻击检定：+2，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 1 点穿刺伤害。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: 近战攻击检定：+4，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 1 点穿刺伤害。

Flyby.name: 飞掠
Flyby.description: 灵魄飞出敌人触及范围时不会引起借机攻击。

Pack Tactics.name: 集群战术
Pack Tactics.description: 灵魄至少有一个未处于失能的盟友在目标生物 5 尺内时，它对该生物发动的攻击检定有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description:
灵魄发动的 [[/item 撕裂]] 攻击次数等于此法术环阶的一半（向下取整）。

[[floor(@flags.dnd5e.summon.level / 2)]]{攻击次数}

Rend.name: 撕裂
Rend.description: 近战攻击检定：加值等于你的法术攻击调整值，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 1d8 + 4 + 法术环阶的穿刺伤害。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 熊发动两次 [[/item 撕裂]] 攻击。

Rend.name: 撕裂
Rend.description: 近战攻击检定：+4，触及 5 尺。命中：5（1d6 + 2）挥砍伤害。

Bloodied Fury.name: 浴血狂怒
Bloodied Fury.description: 野猪在浴血期间进行的攻击检定具有优势。

Gore.name: 顶撞
Gore.description: 近战攻击检定：+3，触及 5 尺。命中：4（1d6 +1）穿刺伤害。若野猪在此次攻击前立即向着该目标直线移动了至少 20 尺，则其额外受到3（1d6）穿刺伤害，若目标体型不超过大型，则其还会陷入 &Reference[Prone] 状态。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 熊发动一次 [[/item 啃咬]] 攻击和一次 [[/item 爪击]] 攻击。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：7（1d8 + 3）穿刺伤害。

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：5（1d4 + 3）挥砍伤害，且目标若体型为巨型或更小，则会陷入 &Reference[prone] 状态。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: 近战攻击检定：+4，触及 5 尺。命中：4（1d4 + 2）钝击伤害。

Jumper.name: 猫跃
Jumper.description: 猫使用其敏捷来决定跳跃的距离，而非使用其力量。

Scratch.name: 抓挠
Scratch.description: 近战攻击检定：+4，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 1 点挥砍伤害。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description:
灵魄发动等于法术环阶一半次数的攻击（向下取整）。

[[floor(@flags.dnd5e.summon.level / 2)]]{攻击次数}

Radiant Bow.name: 光耀之弓
Radiant Bow.description: （仅复仇圣灵）远程攻击检定：加值等于你的法术攻击加值，射程 600 尺。命中：2d6 + 2 + 法术环阶的光耀伤害。

Radiant Mace.name: 光耀之锤
Radiant Mace.description: （仅守护圣灵）近战攻击：加值等于你的法术攻击加值，触及 5 尺。命中：1d10 + 3 + 法术环阶的光耀伤害，且灵魄可选择自己或其 10 尺内可见的另一生物，令其获得 [[/healing 1d10 type=temphp]]{1d10 临时生命值}。

Healing Touch.name: 治愈之触
Healing Touch.description: 灵魄触碰另一生物。目标魔法性地恢复 2d8 + 法术环阶点生命值。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: 近战攻击检定：+4，触及 5 尺。命中：6（1d8 + 2）穿刺伤害。

Constrict.name: 绞缠
Constrict.description: 力量豁免： DC 12，在蛇 5 尺内能看见的一个中型或更小的生物。失败： 7（3d4）钝击伤害，且目标处于 &Reference[grappled] 状态（逃脱 DC 12）。

Stony Lethargy.name: 石迷昏眠
Stony Lethargy.description: 当一个灵魄可见的生物在其 10 尺距离内开始回合时，它可以对其释放出一道魔法能量。感知豁免：DC等于你的法术豁免DC，被指定的生物。失败：目标不能进行借机攻击且速度减半，持续直至其下一回合开始。

Stony Lethargy.name: 石迷昏眠
Stony Lethargy.description: 你不能进行借机攻击且速度减半，持续直至灵魄下一回合开始。

Heated Body.name: 灼热之躯
Heated Body.description: 当一个生物对灵魄发动近战攻击并命中，或是在擒抱灵魄、被灵魄擒抱期间开始其回合时，那个生物受到 1d10 火焰伤害。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description:
灵魄发动等于法术环阶一半次数的 [[/item 猛击]] 攻击（向下取整）。

[[floor(@flags.dnd5e.summon.level / 2)]]{攻击次数}

Slam.name: 猛击
Slam.description: 近战攻击检定：加值等于你的法术攻击调整值，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 1d8 + 4 + 法术等级的钝击伤害。

Berserk Lashing.name: 狂怒乱击
Berserk Lashing.description: 触发：一个生物对灵魄造成了伤害。响应：灵魄对该目标发动一次 [[/item 猛击]] 攻击（若可能），或者灵魄向那个目标移动至多等于其速度一半的距离且不触发借机攻击。

Attack or Move.name: 攻击并移动
Attack or Move.condition: 一个生物在其回合开始时处于范围内

Amphibious.name: 水陆两栖
Amphibious.description: 螃蟹可以在空气和水中呼吸。

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description: 近战攻击检定：+2，触及 5 尺。命中：1 钝击伤害。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: 近战攻击检定：+4，攻击范围 5 英尺。命中：6（1d8 + 2）穿刺伤害。如果目标为中型或更小体型，目标将 &Reference[grappled apply=false] （逃脱 DC 12）。被擒抱时，目标将陷入 &Reference[restrained apply=false] 状态。

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description: 你将 &Reference[grappled apply=false] （逃脱 DC 12）。被擒抱时，你将陷入 &Reference[restrained apply=false] 状态。

Pack Tactics.name: 集群战术
Pack Tactics.description: 狼至少有一个未处于失能的盟友在目标生物 5 尺内时，它对该生物发动的攻击检定有优势。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：8（1d10 + 3）穿刺伤害，且目标若体型为巨型或更小，则会 &Reference[prone] 状态。

Shared Resistances.name: 分享抗性
Shared Resistances.description:
当你召唤此灵魄时，选择一项它具有的伤害 &Reference[damageresistance]{抗性 Resistance} 。直至法术结束前，你也会获得所选伤害的抗性。

Foundry Note

此物品提供了主动效果以及应用这些效应的行动，可选择性地应用所选的抗性。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description:
灵魄发动等于法术环阶一半次数的 [[/item 撕裂]] 攻击（向下取整），并使用其 [[/item 吐息武器]]。

[[floor(@flags.dnd5e.summon.level / 2)]]{攻击次数}

Rend.name: 撕裂
Rend.description: 近战攻击检定：加值等于你的法术攻击加值，触及 10 尺。命中：1d6 + 4 + 法术环阶的穿刺伤害。

Breath Weapon.name: 吐息武器
Breath Weapon.description: 敏捷豁免：DC等于你的法术豁免DC，30 尺锥状内的每个生物。失败：2d6 点伤害（伤害类型由你在施法时从灵魄的伤害抗性中选择）。成功：半伤。

Hooves.name: 蹄击
Hooves.description: 近战攻击检定：+6，触及 5 尺。命中：6（1d4 + 4）钝击伤害。

Amorphous Form.name: 不定形态
Amorphous Form.description: 灵魄能够轻松穿过最窄 1 寸宽的狭窄空间，如同其是困难地形一般。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description:
灵魄发动等于法术环阶一半次数的 [[/item 猛击]] 攻击（向下取整）。

[[floor(@flags.dnd5e.summon.level / 2)]]{攻击次数}

Slam.name: 猛击
Slam.description: 近战攻击检定：加值等于你的法术攻击加值，触及 5 尺。命中：1d10 + 4 + 法术环阶的钝击（仅土）、寒冷（仅水）、闪电（仅气）、火焰（仅火）伤害。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 象发动两次 [[/item 顶撞]] 攻击。

Gore.name: 顶撞
Gore.description: 近战攻击检定：+8，触及 5 尺。命中：15（2d8 + 6）穿刺伤害。如果大象在击中目标前至少直线移动了 20 尺，目标陷入&Reference[prone] 状态。

Trample.name: 践踏
Trample.description: 敏捷豁免： DC 16，单一 5 尺内且处于倒地状态的生物。失败： 造成 17（2d10 + 6）钝击伤害。成功： 半伤。

Ram.name: 冲撞
Ram.description: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：6（1d6 + 3）钝击伤害。如果麋鹿在命中目标前至少直线移动了 20 尺，目标会额外承受 3（1d6）钝击伤害，并且如果目标体型为巨型或更小，会陷入 &Reference[prone] 状态。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: 在施法者回合开始时，猎犬会试图啃咬它 5 尺范围内的一个敌人。该敌人必须成功通过敏捷豁免检定，否则将承受 4d8 力场伤害。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description:
灵魄发动等于法术环阶一半次数的 [[/item 妖精之剑]] （向下取整）。

[[floor(@flags.dnd5e.summon.level / 2)]]{攻击次数}

Fey Blade.name: 妖精之剑
Fey Blade.description: 近战攻击检定： 加值等于你的法术攻击调整值，触及 5 尺。命中： 2d6 + 3 + 法术环阶 力场伤害。

Fey Step.name: 妖精步伐
Fey Step.description:
灵魄魔法地传送至多30尺至一处它可见的未被占据空间。随后根据所选情绪，灵魄触发以下效果之一：

愤怒。妖精在此回合结束前的下一次攻击检定具有优势。

[[/item 欢欣]] @Embed[.phbaoiMirthful00 caption=false cite=false]

[[/item 诡诈]] @Embed[.phbaoiTricksy000 caption=false cite=false]

Mirthful.name: 欢欣
Mirthful.description: 感知豁免：DC等于你的法术豁免DC，单一灵魄 10 尺内它可见的生物。失败：目标受你和灵魄 &Reference[charmed apply=false] 1 分钟或直到目标受到任意伤害。

Charmed.name: 被魅惑
Charmed.description: 你受施法者和灵魄 &Reference[charmed apply=false] 1 分钟或直到你受到任意伤害。

Tricksy.name: 诡诈
Tricksy.description: 灵魄令魔法 &Reference[darkness]充斥于它 5 尺内的一处 10 尺立方区域，持续直到灵魄的下一回合结束。

Death Throes.name: 焚身爆
Death Throes.description:
当灵魄生命值降值 0 时，或是法术结束时，灵魄会爆炸。

敏捷豁免：DC等于你的法术豁免DC，以灵魄为源点 10 尺光环区域内的每个生物。

失败：2d10 + 法术环阶的火焰伤害。

Explode.name: 爆炸
Explode.condition: 当灵魄生命值降值 0 时，或是法术结束时

Devil’s Sight.name: 魔鬼视界
Devil’s Sight.description: 魔法黑暗不会阻碍灵魄的黑暗视觉。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: 灵魄为抵抗法术和其他魔法效应而作的豁免检定具有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description:
灵魄发动等于法术环阶一半次数的攻击（向下取整）。

[[floor(@flags.dnd5e.summon.level / 2)]]{攻击次数}

Bite (Demon Only).name: 啃咬（仅恶魔）
Bite (Demon Only).description: 近战攻击检定：加值等于你的法术攻击加值，触及 5 尺。命中：1d12 + 3 + 法术环阶的暗蚀伤害。

Claws (Yugoloth Only).name: 爪击（仅尤格罗斯魔）
Claws (Yugoloth Only).description: 近战攻击检定 命中采取你的法术攻击调整值，触及 5 尺。 命中： 1d8 + 3 + 法术环数的挥砍伤害。发动攻击后，邪魔可以魔法性地传送至一处 30 尺内其可见且未被占据的空间。

Fiery Strike (Devil Only).name: 狂焰袭（仅魔鬼）
Fiery Strike (Devil Only).description: 近战或远程攻击检定：加值等于你的法术攻击加值，触及 5 尺或射程 150 尺。命中：2d6 + 3 + 法术环阶的火焰伤害。

Amphibious.name: 水陆两栖
Amphibious.description: 青蛙可以在空气和水中呼吸。

Standing Leap.name: 立定起跳
Standing Leap.description: 青蛙无需助跑即可跳远至多 10 尺或跳高至高 5 尺。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: 近战攻击检定：+3，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 1 点穿刺伤害。

Galley.name: 桨帆船
Galley.description:
速度: 4 mph

船员: 80

乘员: —

货物（吨）： 150

AC： 15

HP： 500

伤害阈值： 20

价格： 30,000 GP

biography.value:
速度: 4 mph

船员: 80

乘员: —

货物（吨）： 150

AC： 15

HP： 500

伤害阈值： 20

价格： 30,000 GP

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: 近战攻击检定：+3，触及 5 尺。命中：6（2d4 + 1）穿刺伤害。

Amphibious.name: 水陆两栖
Amphibious.description: 螃蟹可以在空气和水中呼吸。

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description: 近战攻击检定：+3，触及 5 尺。命中：4（1d6 + 1）钝击伤害。若目标为中型或更小体型，其将&Reference[grappled] （逃脱DC 11）。这只蟹有两只螯，每只螯都能擒住一个目标。

Ram.name: 冲撞
Ram.description: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：6（1d6 + 3）钝击伤害。如果山羊在命中目标前至少直线移动了 20 尺，目标会额外承受 5（2d4）钝击伤害，并且如果目标体型为巨型或更小，会陷入 &Reference[prone] 状态。

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: 巨虫能够在困难表面上攀爬，包括倒吊在天花板上，而不需要进行属性检定。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description:
巨虫发动等同于法术环数一半的次数的攻击（向下取整）。

[[floor(@flags.dnd5e.summon.level / 2)]]{攻击次数}

Poison Jab.name: 猛毒刺
Poison Jab.description: 近战攻击检定：加值等同于你的法术攻击调整值，触及 10 尺。命中：1d6 + 3 + 法术环阶点穿刺伤害 + 1d4 点毒素伤害。

Web Bolt.name: 蛛网箭
Web Bolt.description: 远程攻击检定：加值等同于你的法术攻击调整值，射程 60 尺。命中：1d10 + 3 + 法术环阶点钝击伤害，且目标直到巨虫的下个回合开始为止速度降为 0。

Webbed.name: 落网
Webbed.description: 你直到巨虫的下个回合开始为止速度降为 0。

Venomous Spew.name: 剧毒喷涌
Venomous Spew.description: 体质豁免：你的法术豁免难度等级，一只巨虫在 10 尺内能看见的生物。失败：目标会处于 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态，直至巨虫下一轮开始。

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 你会处于 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态，直至巨虫下一轮开始。

Ram.name: 冲撞
Ram.description: 近战攻击检定：+4，触及 5 尺。命中：9（2d6 + 2）钝击伤害，若海马在此次攻击前立即向着该目标直线移动了至少 20 尺则改为 11（2d8 + 2）钝击伤害。

Bubble Dash.name: 泡泡疾行
Bubble Dash.description: 海马移动至多等于其游泳速度一半的距离且不引发借机攻击。此时海马必须位于水下。

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: 蜘蛛能够在困难表面上攀爬，包括倒吊在天花板上，而不需要进行属性检定。

Web Walker.name: 蛛网行者
Web Walker.description: 蜘蛛在蛛网上移动时无视蛛网造成的移动限制，且与蛛网接触时，蜘蛛可以知道其他与该蛛网接触生物的准确位置。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：穿刺伤害 7（1d8 + 3）+ 毒素伤害 7（2d6）。

Web.name: 蛛网
Web.description: 敏捷豁免：DC 13，单一 60 尺内蜘蛛可见的生物。失败：目标陷入&Reference[restrained] 状态直至蛛网被摧毁（AC 10；HP 5；火焰易伤；免疫毒素与心灵伤害）。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：5（1d4 + 3）穿刺伤害。

Ram.name: 冲撞
Ram.description: 近战攻击检定：+2，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 1 点钝击伤害，或者如果山羊在击中目标前至少直线移动了 20 尺，造成 2（1d4）点钝击伤害。

Talons.name: 禽爪
Talons.description: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 1 点挥砍伤害。

Devil’s Sight.name: 魔鬼视界
Devil’s Sight.description: 魔法黑暗不会影响小魔鬼的黑暗视觉。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: 小魔鬼对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Sting.name: 钉刺
Sting.description: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 6（1d6 + 3）穿刺伤害外加 7（2d6）毒素伤害。

Invisibility.name: 隐形
Invisibility.description:
小魔鬼对自身施展 [[/item oHafKbzbqYGiL4i1]] ，无需任何法术成分并使用魅力作为施法属性。

@Embed[.oHafKbzbqYGiL4i1 caption=false]

Shape-Shift.name: 变形
Shape-Shift.description: 小魔鬼变形为一只老鼠（速度 20 尺）、渡鸦（20 尺，飞行 60 尺）或蜘蛛（20 尺，攀爬 20 尺）的形象，或是变回其真实形态。除速度外，其各形态下的数据皆相同。它携带或着装的任何装备都不会随之变化。

oHafKbzbqYGiL4i1.name: 隐形
oHafKbzbqYGiL4i1.description: 你触碰的一个生物进入 &Reference[invisible apply=false] 状态并维持至法术终止。如果目标进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Invisibility.name: 隐形
Invisibility.description: 如果目标进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Keelboat.name: 龙骨船
Keelboat.description:
速度： 1 mph

船员： 1

乘员： —

货物（吨）： 1/2

AC： 15

HP： 100

伤害阈值： 10

价格： 3,000 GP

biography.value:
速度： 1 mph

船员： 1

乘员： —

货物（吨）： 1/2

AC： 15

HP： 100

伤害阈值： 10

价格： 3,000 GP

Pack Tactics.name: 集群战术
Pack Tactics.description: 若狮子的攻击目标生物周围 5 尺范围内存在有至少一个狮子未失能的盟友，则狮子对该生物进行的攻击检定具有优势。

Running Leap.name: 助跑起跳
Running Leap.description: 狮子在助跑 10 尺后可以跳远至多 25 尺。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 狮子发动两次 [[/item 撕裂]] 攻击。它可以将其中一次攻击替换为使用 [[/item 咆哮]]。

Rend.name: 撕裂
Rend.description: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：7（1d8 + 3）挥砍伤害。

Roar.name: 咆哮
Roar.description: 感知豁免：DC 11，单一 15 尺内的生物。失败：目标陷入 &Reference[frightened apply=false] 状态，持续直至狮子的下一回合开始。

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: 感知豁免：DC 11，单一 15 尺内的生物。失败：目标陷入 &Reference[frightened apply=false] 状态，持续直至狮子的下一回合开始。

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: 蜥蜴可以在难以攀爬的表面上攀爬，包括倒吊在天花板上，而不需要为此进行属性检定。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: 近战攻击检定：+2，触及 5 尺。命中：1 穿刺伤害。

Longship.name: 单帆长船
Longship.description:
速度: 3 mph

船员： 40

乘员： 150

货物（吨）： 10

AC： 15

HP： 300

伤害阈值： 15

价格： 10,000 GP

biography.value:
速度: 3 mph

船员： 40

乘员： 150

货物（吨）： 10

AC： 15

HP： 300

伤害阈值： 15

价格： 10,000 GP

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: 近战攻击检定：+3，触及 5 尺。命中：4（1d6 + 1）穿刺伤害，且目标若体型为大或更小则陷入 &Reference[prone apply=false] 状态。

Beast of Burden.name: 驼兽
Beast of Burden.description: 在决定骡的载重能力时，其被视为更大一级的体型。

Hooves.name: 蹄击
Hooves.description: 近战攻击检定：+4，触及 5 尺。命中：4（1d4 + 2）钝击伤害。

Compression.name: 柔韧躯体
Compression.description: 章鱼可以移动穿过最窄 1 寸宽的缝隙。

Ink Cloud.name: 墨水云
Ink Cloud.description: 触发：于水中期间，一个生物在章鱼 5 尺内结束其回合。响应：章鱼释放出墨水覆盖以自己为源点的 5 尺立方区域，且章鱼立即移动等于其游泳速度的距离。该立方区域在 1 分钟内变为 &Reference[heavilyobscured] ，当有强力水流或类似效应将墨水击散时，该效应提前结束。

Obscure Area.name: 遮蔽区域
Obscure Area.condition: 一个生物在章鱼 5 尺内结束其回合

Tentacles.name: 触须
Tentacles.description: 近战攻击检定：+4，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 1 点钝击伤害。

Life Bond.name: 生命连接
Life Bond.description: 当你从一道一环或以上的法术中恢复生命值时，若你位于坐骑 5 尺内，则坐骑也会恢复相同数量的生命值。

Otherworldly Slam.name: 异界猛击
Otherworldly Slam.description: 近战攻击检定：加值等同于你的法术攻击调整值，触及 5 尺。命中：1d8 + 法术环阶点光耀（天族）、心灵（妖精）、暗蚀（邪魔）伤害。

Fell Glare.name: 堕落凝视
Fell Glare.description: 感知豁免：DC等同于你的法术豁免DC，一名距坐骑 60 尺内的可见生物。失败：目标直到你下个回合结束为止陷入 &Reference[frightened apply=false] 状态。

Fey Step.name: 妖精跨步
Fey Step.description: 坐骑连同其骑手传送至你选择的距其 60 尺内未占空间中。

Healing Touch.name: 治愈之触
Healing Touch.description: 一名距坐骑 5 尺内的生物恢复 2d8 + 法术环阶点生命值。

Flyby.name: 飞掠
Flyby.description: 猫头鹰飞出敌人的触及范围时不会引起借机攻击。

Talons.name: 禽爪
Talons.description: 近战攻击检定：+3，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 1 点挥砍伤害。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 黑豹发动一次 [[/item 猛扑]] 攻击，并使用 [[/item 潜行]]。

Pounce.name: 猛扑
Pounce.description: 近战攻击检定：+4，攻击范围 5 尺。命中：4（1d4 + 2）挥砍伤害，若黑豹在攻击检定中具有优势，则造成 7（2d4 + 2）挥砍伤害。

Prowl.name: 潜行
Prowl.description: 黑豹可移动达其移动速度的一半且不会引发机会攻击。在移动结束时，黑豹可以采取&Reference[hide] 动作。

Hooves.name: 蹄击
Hooves.description: 近战攻击检定：+4，触及 5 尺。命中：4（1d4 + 2）钝击伤害。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: 伪龙对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 伪龙发动两次 [[/item 啃咬]] 攻击。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: 近战攻击检定：+4，触及 5 尺。命中：4（1d4 + 2）穿刺伤害。

Sting.name: 钉刺
Sting.description: 体质豁免： DC 12，单一5尺内它可见的生物。失败： 5（2d4 + 2）毒素伤害，且目标陷入 &Reference[poisoned apply=false] 状态 1 小时。 失败且差值 5 点或更多： 目标在中毒期间陷入 &Reference[unconscious apply=false] 状态直至其受到伤害或被另一生物用一个动作摇醒。

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 你陷入 &Reference[poisoned apply=false] 状态 1 小时。

Unconscious.name: 昏迷
Unconscious.description: 失败且差值 5 点或更多： 你在中毒期间陷入 &Reference[unconscious apply=false] 状态直至受到伤害或被另一生物用一个动作摇醒。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: 夸塞魔在抵御法术及其他魔法效应的豁免检定上具有优势。

Rend.name: 撕裂
Rend.description: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：5（1d4 + 3）挥砍伤害，且目标会陷入 &Reference[poisoned apply=false] 状态，直至该夸塞魔的下一个回合开始。

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 你会陷入 &Reference[poisoned apply=false] 状态，直至夸塞魔的下一个回合开始。

Invisibility.name: 隐形
Invisibility.description:
夸塞魔给自己施放 [[/item 7wNdT95XqhyGOpBd]] ，无需施法材料，且魅力值作为施法能力。

@Embed[.7wNdT95XqhyGOpBd caption=false]

Scare.name: 惊吓
Scare.description: 感知豁免：DC 10，20 尺内的一名生物。失败：目标陷入 &Reference[frightened apply=false] 。在其每个回合结束时，目标重复进行豁免检定，成功则该效果在自身上结束。1 分钟后，目标豁免自动成功。

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description:
在你每个回合结束时，你重复进行豁免检定，成功则该效果在自身上结束。1 分钟后，豁免自动成功。

[[/save wis dc=10]]

Shape-Shift.name: 变形
Shape-Shift.description: 夸塞魔用一个动作变形为一只野兽的相仿形态。可选野兽形态有三种：蝙蝠（速度 10 尺，飞行 40 尺），蜈蚣（速度 40 尺，攀爬 40 尺），蟾蜍（速度 40 尺，游泳 40 尺）。它也同样可以用该动作恢复其真实形态。除速度外，它的所有资料均不会发生改变，其随身着装和携带的装备不会随变形发生变化。在死亡时，夸塞魔将恢复其真实形态。

7wNdT95XqhyGOpBd.name: 隐形
7wNdT95XqhyGOpBd.description: 你触碰的一个生物进入 &Reference[invisible apply=false] 状态并维持至法术终止。如果目标进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Invisibility.name: 隐形
Invisibility.description: 如果目标进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Agile.name: 机敏
Agile.description: 老鼠移动离开敌人的触及时不会引发借机攻击。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: 近战攻击检定：+2，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 1 点穿刺伤害。

Mimicry.name: 拟声
Mimicry.description: 渡鸦可以模仿曾听过的简单声音，如低语声或鸟鸣声。听到该声音的生物可以进行一次[[/check skill=ins dc=10]] 检定，检定成功则发现其是模仿。

Beak.name: 喙啄
Beak.description: 近战攻击检定：+4，攻击范围 5 英尺。命中：造成 1 点穿刺伤害。

Pack Tactics.name: 集群战术
Pack Tactics.description: 如果鲨鱼的至少一个盟友在目标生物 5 尺以内，且该盟友未处于失能状态，那么鲨鱼在对目标生物进行攻击检定时具有优势。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: 近战攻击检定：+4，触及 5 尺。命中：7（2d4 + 2）穿刺伤害。

Hooves.name: 蹄击
Hooves.description: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：7（1d8 + 3）钝击伤害。

Rowboat.name: 划船
Rowboat.description:
速度： 1 1/2 mph

船员： 1

乘员： 3

货物（吨）： —

AC： 11

HP： 50

伤害阈值： —

价格： 50 GP

价格： 10,000 GP

biography.value:
速度： 2 mph

船员： 20

乘员： 20

货物（吨）： 100

AC： 15

HP： 300

伤害阈值： 15

价格： 10,000 GP

Sting.name: 钉刺
Sting.description: 近战攻击检定：+2，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 1 点穿刺伤害 + 3（1d6）点毒素伤害。

Shortsword.name: 短剑
Shortsword.description: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：6（1d6 + 3）穿刺伤害。

Shortbow.name: 短弓
Shortbow.description: 远程攻击检定：+5，射程 80/320 尺。命中：6（1d6 + 3）穿刺伤害。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: 史拉蟾蝌蚪对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: 近战攻击检定：+4，触及 5 尺。命中：5（1d6 + 2）穿刺伤害。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: 斯芬克斯为对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Rend.name: 撕裂
Rend.description: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：挥砍伤害 5（1d4 + 3）+ 光耀伤害 7（2d6）。

Burst of Ingenuity.name: 灵光乍现
Burst of Ingenuity.description: 触发：斯芬克斯或其 30 尺内另一生物进行一次属性检定或豁免检定。响应：斯芬克斯令其结果 +2。

utility.condition: 斯芬克斯或其 30 尺内另一生物进行一次属性检定或豁免检定

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: 蜘蛛可以在难以攀爬的表面上攀爬，包括倒吊在天花板上，且不需要为其进行属性检定。

Web Walker.name: 蛛网行者
Web Walker.description: 蜘蛛在蛛网上移动时无视蛛网造成的移动限制，且与蛛网接触时，蜘蛛可以知道其他与该蛛网接触生物的准确位置。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: 近战攻击检定：+4，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 1 点穿刺伤害，外加 2（1d4）点毒素伤害。

Needle Sword.name: 针剑
Needle Sword.description: 近战攻击检定：+6，触及 5 尺。命中：6（1d4 + 4）穿刺伤害。

Enchanting Bow.name: 魅惑之弓
Enchanting Bow.description: 远程攻击检定：+6，射程 40/160 尺。命中：造成 1 穿刺伤害，且目标陷入 &Reference[charmed apply=false] 状态直至小妖精的下一回合开始。

Charmed.name: 被魅惑
Charmed.description: 你陷入 &Reference[charmed apply=false] 状态直至小妖精的下一回合开始。

Heart Sight.name: 真心视界
Heart Sight.description: 魅力豁免： DC 10，单一 5 尺内它可见的生物（天界，邪魔和亡灵自动失败于此豁免）。失败： 小妖精可以知道目标的情绪及阵营。

Invisibility.name: 隐形
Invisibility.description:
小妖精对自身施展 [[/item lO6diOZO5FReftK6]] ，无需任何法术成分并使用魅力作为施法属性。

@Embed[.lO6diOZO5FReftK6 caption=false]

lO6diOZO5FReftK6.name: 隐形
lO6diOZO5FReftK6.description: 你触碰的一个生物进入 &Reference[invisible apply=false] 状态并维持至法术终止。如果目标进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Invisibility.name: 隐形
Invisibility.description: 如果目标进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 虎发动一次 [[/item 猛扑]] 攻击，并使用 [[/item 潜行]]。

Pounce.name: 猛扑
Pounce.description: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：6（1d6 + 3）挥砍伤害。若虎在攻击检定上有优势，目标会额外承受 3（1d6）挥砍伤害，且若目标体型为巨型或更小，则会陷入 &Reference[prone] 状态。

Prowl.name: 潜行
Prowl.description: 虎可移动达其移动速度的一半且不会引发机会攻击。在移动结束时，虎可以采取&Reference[hide] 动作。

Festering Aura.name: 腐灭灵光
Festering Aura.description: 体质豁免：DC等于你的法术豁免DC，所有在以灵魄为源点 5 尺光环区域内开始其回合的生物（除了你）。失败：该生物陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态，直至其下一回合开始。

save.condition: 所有在以灵魄为源点 5 尺光环区域内开始其回合的生物（除了施法者）

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 该生物陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态，直至其下一回合开始。

Incorporeal Passage.name: 虚体移动
Incorporeal Passage.description: 灵魄可以虚体化并如同穿过 &Reference[difficultterrain]一样穿过其他生物和物件。如果它在自己的回合结束时仍处在物件内部，则被挪到距离最近的未被占据的位置，且每因此移动5尺便受到 [[/damage 1d10 type=force]] 伤害。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description:
灵魄发动等于法术环阶一半次数的攻击（向下取整）。

[[floor(@flags.dnd5e.summon.level / 2)]]{攻击次数}

Deathly Touch.name: 致死之触
Deathly Touch.description: 近战攻击检定：加值等于你的法术攻击加值，触及 5 尺。命中：1d8 + 3 + 法术环阶的暗蚀伤害，且目标陷入 &Reference[frightened apply=false] 状态直至其下一回合结束。

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: 你陷入 &Reference[frightened apply=false] 状态直至其下一回合结束。

Grave Bolt.name: 暗澹箭
Grave Bolt.description: 远程攻击检定：加值等于你的法术攻击加值，射程 150 尺。命中：2d4 + 3 + 法术环阶的暗蚀伤害。

Rotting Claw.name: 腐灭爪击
Rotting Claw.description:
（仅腐尸）

近战攻击检定：加值等于你的法术攻击加值，触及 5 尺。命中：1d6 + 3 + 法术环阶的挥砍伤害。若目标具有 &Reference[poisoned apply=false] 状态，则其还会陷入 &Reference[paralyzed apply=false] ，直至其下一回合结束。

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 若你具有 &Reference[poisoned apply=false] 状态，则还会陷入 &Reference[paralyzed apply=false] ，直至下一回合结束。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: 近战攻击检定：+4，触及 5 尺。命中：4（1d4 + 2）穿刺伤害 + 3（1d6）毒素伤害。

Hooves.name: 蹄击
Hooves.description: 近战攻击检定：+6，触及5尺。命中：9（2d4 + 4）钝击伤害。若战马在此次攻击前立即向着该目标直线移动了至少 20 尺，则其额外受到5（2d4）钝击伤害，若目标体型不超过巨型，则其还会陷入 &Reference[prone] 状态。

Undead Fortitude.name: 不死坚韧
Undead Fortitude.description: 当僵尸因受非光耀非重击伤害而使其生命值减至 0 时，它必须进行一次 DC 为 5＋所受伤害值的体质豁免，豁免成功则生命值降至 1。

Slam.name: 猛击
Slam.description: 近战攻击检定：+3，触及 5 尺。命中：4（1d6 + 1）钝击伤害。

Life Bond.name: 生命连接
Life Bond.description: 当你从一道一环或以上的法术中恢复生命值时，若你位于坐骑 5 尺内，则坐骑也会恢复相同数量的生命值。

Otherworldly Slam.name: 异界猛击
Otherworldly Slam.description: 近战攻击检定：加值等同于你的法术攻击调整值，触及 5 尺。命中：1d8 + 法术环阶的光耀伤害。

Healing Touch.name: 治愈之触
Healing Touch.description: 一名距坐骑 5 尺内的生物恢复 2d8 + 法术环阶点生命值。

Life Bond.name: 生命连接
Life Bond.description: 当你从一道一环或以上的法术中恢复生命值时，若你位于坐骑 5 尺内，则坐骑也会恢复相同数量的生命值。

Otherworldly Slam.name: 异界猛击
Otherworldly Slam.description: 近战攻击检定：加值等同于你的法术攻击调整值，触及 5 尺。命中：1d8 + 法术环阶的心灵伤害。

Fey Step.name: 妖精跨步
Fey Step.description: 坐骑连同其骑手传送至你选择的距其 60 尺内未占空间中。

Life Bond.name: 生命连接
Life Bond.description: 当你从一道一环或以上的法术中恢复生命值时，若你位于坐骑 5 尺内，则坐骑也会恢复相同数量的生命值。

Otherworldly Slam.name: 异界猛击
Otherworldly Slam.description: 近战攻击检定：加值等同于你的法术攻击调整值，触及 5 尺。命中：1d8 + 法术环阶的暗蚀伤害。

Fell Glare.name: 堕落凝视
Fell Glare.description: 感知豁免：DC等同于你的法术豁免DC，一名距坐骑 60 尺内的可见生物。失败：目标直到你下个回合结束为止陷入 &Reference[frightened apply=false] 状态。

Goliath.name: 歌利亚
Goliath.description:
歌利亚比绝大多数族裔更高，巨人是这一族的远祖。每一个歌利亚都承载着元祖巨人的祝福，这些祝福体现在各种超自然恩惠中，包括快速成长并暂时接近巨人先祖高度的能力。

歌利亚的身体特征让人联想到家族血系来源的巨人。例如，一些歌利亚看起来像石巨人，而另一些则像火巨人。无论其宗族来于何种巨人，免受巨人多年内战蹂躏的歌利亚，都在多元宇宙中开辟了自己的道路，并试图超越祖先所达到的高度。

歌利亚特质 Goliath Traits

生物类型 Creature Type: 类人

体型 Size: 中型(约7-8尺高)

速度 Speed: 35 尺

作为歌利亚，你有以下特殊特质：

巨人血统 Giant Ancestry。 你是巨人的后裔。选择以下好处之一——来自你祖先的超自然恩惠；你可以使用所选恩惠的次数等于你的熟练加值，当你完成一次长休后，你重获全部已消耗的使用次数：

云游四方（云巨人）Cloud’s Jaunt (Cloud Giant)。 以一个附赠动作，你可以魔法般地传送到一处30尺内且未被占据的可见空间。

星火燎原（火巨人）Fire’s Burn (Fire Giant)。 当你使用攻击检定击中生物并对其造成伤害时，你可以使该生物受到额外 1d10 点火焰伤害。

凛若冰霜（霜巨人）Frost’s Chill (Frost Giant)。 当你使用攻击检定击中生物并对其造成伤害时，你可以使该生物受到额外 1d6 点 冷冻伤害，并且在你的下一回合开始前速度减少 10 尺。

地动山摇（山丘巨人）Hill’s Tumble (Hill Giant)。当你使用攻击检定击中大型或更小的生物并对其造成伤害时，你可以使该生物陷入" 倒地" 状态。

安如磐石（石巨人）Stone’s Endurance (Stone Giant)。 当你受到伤害时，你可以使用你的反应，掷一粒 d12。将你的体质调整值与骰掷的结果相加，降低该总和的伤害。

驱雷掣电（风暴巨人）Storm’s Thunder (Storm Giant)。 当你受到来自 60 尺内生物的伤害时，你可以用你的反应动作对该生物造成 1d8 雷鸣伤害。

巨化形体 Large Form。 从第 5 级开始，你可以用附赠动作将自己体型变为大型（只要你所处的空间大小足够）。转变持续 10 分钟，或者直到你主动结束（无需动作）。在这段时间内，你进行力量检定具有优势，你的速度增加 10 尺。当你使用此特质后，直到你完成一次长休为止都不能再次使用。

身强力壮 Powerful Build。 你为挣脱被 &Reference[Grappled] 而进行的豁免检定具有优势。在决定你的载重时，你视作为体型大一级的生物。

Giant Ancestry.name: 巨人血统
Giant Ancestry.description:
你是巨人的后裔。选择以下好处之一——来自你祖先的超自然恩惠；你可以使用所选恩惠的次数等于你的熟练加值，当你完成一次长休后，你重获全部已消耗的使用次数：

云游四方（云巨人）Cloud’s Jaunt (Cloud Giant)。 以一个附赠动作，你可以魔法般地传送到一处30尺内且未被占据的可见空间。

星火燎原（火巨人）Fire’s Burn (Fire Giant)。 当你使用攻击检定击中生物并对其造成伤害时，你可以使该生物受到额外 1d10 点火焰伤害。

凛若冰霜（霜巨人）Frost’s Chill (Frost Giant)。 当你使用攻击检定击中生物并对其造成伤害时，你可以使该生物受到额外 1d6 点 冷冻伤害，并且在你的下一回合开始前速度减少 10 尺。

地动山摇（山丘巨人）Hill’s Tumble (Hill Giant)。 当你使用攻击检定击中大型或更小的生物并对其造成伤害时，你可以使该生物陷入" 倒地" 状态。

安如磐石（石巨人）Stone’s Endurance (Stone Giant)。 当你受到伤害时，你可以使用你的反应，掷一粒 d12。将你的体质调整值与骰掷的结果相加，降低该总和的伤害。

驱雷掣电（风暴巨人）Storm’s Thunder (Storm Giant)。 当你受到来自 60 尺内生物的伤害时，你可以用你的反应动作对该生物造成 1d8 雷鸣伤害。

Powerful Build.name: 身强力壮
Powerful Build.description:
你为挣脱被 &Reference[Grappled] 而进行的豁免检定具有优势。在决定你的载重时，你视作为体型大一级的生物。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一个被动效果，在确定负重能力时会自动提升您的体型。

Storm's Thunder.name: 驱雷掣电
Storm's Thunder.description: 当你受到来自 60 尺内生物的伤害时，你可以用你的反应动作对该生物造成 1d8 雷鸣伤害。

Storm's Thunder.name: 驱雷掣电
Storm's Thunder.condition: 当你受到来自 60 尺内生物的伤害时

Sailor.name: 水手
Sailor.description:
属性值： 力量、敏捷、感知

专长： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.feats.Item.phbftTavernBrawl]

技能熟练： 体操和察觉

工具熟练： 领航工具

装备： 选择 A 或 B: (A) @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepDagger0000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulNavigators], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRope0000000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.SsAmWV6YBqeOFihT], 20 GP; 或 (B) 50 GP

你就像海员一样生活，风吹拂在背上，脚下是摇晃的甲板。当你在停泊港落脚的回忆里总是酒吧里的高脚凳。你直面猛烈的风暴，与那些在波涛下生活的人们聊着过去。

Tavern Brawler.name: 酒馆殴斗者
Tavern Brawler.description:
你将获得以下增益。

强化徒手打击 Enhanced Unarmed Strike。 当你使用徒手打击命中并造成伤害时，你可以造成 1d4 加你的力量调整值的钝击伤害，而不是徒手打击的普通伤害。

伤害重掷 Damage Rerolls。 每次为徒手打击掷伤害骰时，如果掷出 1，则可以重骰一次，但你必须使用重骰的结果。

临时武器 Improvised Weaponry。 你拥有临时武器的熟练项。

推撞 Push。 在你的回合中，当你使用攻击动作中的徒手打击命中一个生物时，你可以对目标造成伤害并将其推离你 5 尺。该增益在一回合中只能使用一次。

Foundry Note

该专长会自动授予熟练项

“强化徒手打击 Enhanced Unarmed Strike” 行动包含着伤害值的变动。

Navigator’s Tools.name: 领航工具
Navigator’s Tools.description:
属性 Ability: 感知

利用 Utilize: 计划路线（DC 10），或通过观星判断位置（DC 15）

Rope.name: 绳索
Rope.description:
以一个利用动作，你可以进行一次DC 10 的敏捷（巧手）检定。如果该检定成功，你能用绳索打一个结。扯坏绳索需要通过一次DC 20 的力量（运动）检定。

你可以利用绳索捆住一个非自愿生物，但该生物必须处于 &Reference[Grappled], &Reference[Incapacitated], 或 &Reference[Restrained] 状态。如果你绑住了该生物的腿，该生物陷入束缚状态，直至挣脱。挣脱绳索需要该生物使用动作来通过一次DC 15 的敏捷（特技）检定。

Traveler's Clothes.name: 旅行服装
Traveler's Clothes.description: 旅行服装是为应对多种环境而设计的结实服装。

Explorer’s Pack.name: 探索套组
Explorer’s Pack.description: 探索套组包含以下物品：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBackpack000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBedroll0000], 2 扁瓶 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000], 10 天份 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRations0000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRope0000000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00], 10 根 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTorch000000], 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagWaterskin00]。

Bedroll.name: 铺盖
Bedroll.description: 一卷铺盖能睡下一个小型或中型生物。躺在铺盖中时，你自动通过抵抗极寒的豁免检定（详见地下城主指南）。

Oil.name: 燃油
Oil.description:
你能将燃油泼在一个生物、物件或一处空间上，你也可以将燃油作为燃料使用。具体使用方法如下。

泼洒一个生物或一个物件 Dousing a Creature or an Object。 当你执行攻击动作时，你可以将你的一次攻击替换为丢出一扁瓶燃油。你可以选择位于你20尺内可见的一个生物或物件作为目标。该目标必须通过一次敏捷豁免（DC等于 8 + 你的敏捷调整值 + 你的熟练加值），失败则被燃油覆盖。如果目标在燃油挥发前（1 分钟后）受到任何火焰伤害，则目标因燃烧的燃油受到额外[[/damage 5 type=fire]]伤害。

泼洒一处空间 Dousing a Space。 以一个利用动作，你可以将一扁瓶燃油泼在地面上，以覆盖一块边长 5 尺且保持水平的方形区域。点燃后，从点燃时算起，燃油会持续燃烧两轮并在回合结束时熄灭（或 12 秒）。点燃时，任何进入该区域或在该区域结束其回合的生物都会受到 5 点火焰伤害。同一生物每回合只受该伤害作用一次。

燃料 Fuel。 燃油能作为油灯和提灯的燃料使用。一旦点着，一扁瓶的燃油可以在油灯和提灯中持续燃烧 6 小时。持续时长并不需要是连续的，你可以熄灭点着的燃油（以一个利用动作），并在之后再点燃，直到总共燃烧了 6 小时。

Rations.name: 口粮
Rations.description: 口粮由适合长途旅行携带的食物组成，包含肉干、风干水果、饼干和坚果等。不进食的危害详见术语汇编中的 &Reference[Malnutrition] 部分。

Tinderbox.name: 火绒盒
Tinderbox.description: 火绒盒是一种装有打火石、火镰和火绒（通常是浸泡在燃油里的干布料）的小型容器，其中的物品可以用来点火。你可以使用附赠动作来用它点燃任何具有燃料的东西——例如蜡烛、油灯或火把。在没有燃料的情况下生火需要 1 分钟时间。

Torch.name: 火把
Torch.description: 火把点燃后能够燃烧 1 小时，燃烧期间发出 20 尺半径的明亮光照和额外 20 尺的微光光照。当你执行攻击动作时，你可以将火把当作简易近战武器，并使用火把发动攻击。命中时，目标受到 1 点火焰伤害。

Waterskin.name: 水袋
Waterskin.description: 水袋具有 4 品脱容量。如果你喝水不足，你会遭受 &Reference[dehydration] 的危害（见规则详述）。

Water (Pint).name: 水（品脱）
Water (Pint).description: 如果你没有喝足够的水，你就有风险陷入 &Reference[dehydration] 状态。

Barbarian.name: 野蛮人
Barbarian.description:
原始狂怒的刚猛斗士 A Fierce Warrior of Primal Rage

野蛮人核心特质 Core Barbarian Traits

关键属性 Primary Ability

力量

生命骰Hit Point Die

每野蛮人等级 D12

豁免熟练项Saving Throw Proficiencies

力量和体质

技能熟练项 Skill Proficiencies

从驯兽、运动、威吓、自然、察觉或生存中选择两项

武器熟练项 Weapon Proficiencies

简易武器、军用武器

护甲训练 Armor Training

轻甲、中甲以及护盾

起始装备 Starting Equipment

选择A或B：（A）巨斧、4把手斧、探索套组和15 GP；或（B）75 GP

野蛮人是强大的战士，他们由多元宇宙的原初力量所驱动，而这股力量便是“狂暴”。野蛮人的狂暴不只是一种情感，而且是猎食者在绝境中激发的凶暴，是暴风雨般不顾一切的猛袭，也是大海中翻滚不息的波涛。

一些野蛮人将“愤怒”具象化为凶蛮的灵体，或敬仰的先祖。另一些野蛮人却认为狂暴与世界的痛苦悲伤皆有联系，还有人认为狂暴是来自狂野魔法的无情纠缠，更有些人认为，狂暴是他们内心最深处，一种自我的表达。对所有野蛮人来说，而这种狂暴不止为每个野蛮人点燃其战斗狂热，更是他们灵活闪避，抵挡伤害和增强力量的源泉。

野蛮人通常扮演着社群的保护者和领导者。他们往往只身冲向危险，只为保护他人。面对危险的勇气使野蛮人非常适合冒险。

成为野蛮人...

作为 1 级角色

  • 获得“野蛮人核心特质”表中的所有特质。
  • 获得“野蛮人特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。

作为兼职角色

  • 获得“野蛮人核心特质”表中的以下特质：生命骰、熟练军用武器、盾牌训练。
  • 获得“野蛮人特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。

Rage.name: 狂暴
Rage.description:
你可以将名为狂暴的原初之力赋予己身，为你带来超越常规的伟力和韧性。未着装重甲时，你可以以一个附赠动作进入狂暴。

你可以进入狂暴的次数见野蛮人特性表中“狂暴次数”一栏。 (当前 [[lookup @scale.barbarian.rage]])。当你完成一次短休时，你重获一次已使用的狂暴次数；当你完成一次长休时，你重获所有已使用的狂暴次数。

你的狂暴激活期间，你将遵循以下这些规则：

伤害抗性 Damage Resistance。 你具有钝击，穿刺和挥砍伤害的抗性。

狂暴伤害 Rage Damage。 当你使用力量发动一次攻击并对目标造成伤害时（无论这是一次武器攻击还是一次徒手打击），你的伤害掷骰获得额外加值，这个加值随着你的野蛮人等级提升，见野蛮人特性表中“狂暴伤害”一栏。

力量优势 Strength Advantage。 你的力量检定和力量豁免具有优势。

无法专注或施法 No Concentration or Spells。 你无法保持专注Concentration，也不能施展法术。

持续时间 Duration。 狂暴持续到你的下一个回合结束，如果你穿戴重甲或陷入失能Incapacitated状态，狂暴提前结束。如果在你的下一回合你的狂暴仍处于激活状态，你可以执行以下选项之一令你的狂暴延长一轮：

  • 对敌人进行一次攻击检定。
  • 迫使一名敌人进行一次豁免检定。
  • 以一个附赠动作延长你的狂暴。

每当狂暴被延长，都会持续到你的下一个回合结束。你可以维持狂暴至多10分钟。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一个主动效果，能自动实现抗性以及额外伤害。此特性还会在短休和长休时自动恢复你的狂暴次数。

Unarmored Defense.name: 无甲防御
Unarmored Defense.description: 你未着装任何护甲期间，你的基础AC等于 10 + 你的敏捷调整值 + 你的体质调整值。你可以使用 盾牌 Shield 而仍然从此特性获益。

Weapon Mastery.name: 武器精通
Weapon Mastery.description:
你对武器的训练使你能够运用两种自选的简易或军用近战武器的精通属性，例如巨斧和手斧。

当你完成一次长休后，你可以重新演练武器技巧，来改变你所选择的其中一个武器类型。

当你获得特定的野蛮人等级时，你还可以使用更多种类武器的精通属性，具体数据见野蛮人特性表中“武器精通”一栏。

Bard.name: 吟游诗人
Bard.description:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCreatingAChar.JournalEntryPage.5ay66aAVgkgRH7qH]{Step 1: Choose a Class}

Lute.name: 鲁特琴
Lute.description:
Ability: Charisma

Utilize: Play a known tune (DC 10), or improvise a song (DC 15)

Costume.name: Costume
Costume.description: While wearing a Costume, you have Advantage on any ability check you make to impersonate the person or type of person it represents.

Mirror.name: Mirror
Mirror.description: A handheld steel Mirror is useful for personal cosmetics but also for peeking around corners and reflecting light as a signal.

Perfume.name: Perfume
Perfume.description: Perfume comes in a 4-ounce vial. For 1 hour after applying Perfume to yourself, you have Advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks made to influence an Indifferent Humanoid within 5 feet of yourself.

Clothes, Traveler’s.name: Clothes, Traveler’s
Clothes, Traveler’s.description: Traveler’s Clothes are resilient garments designed for travel in various environments.

Entertainer’s Pack.name: Entertainer’s Pack
Entertainer’s Pack.description: An Entertainer’s Pack contains the following items: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBackpack000]{Backpack}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBedroll0000]{Bedroll}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBell0000000]{Bell}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.UkWdyJYQTfVX2cJW]{Bullseye Lantern}, 3 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCostume0000]{Costumes}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagMirror00000]{Mirror}, 8 flasks of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000]{Oil}, 9 days of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRations0000]{Rations}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00]{Tinderbox}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagWaterskin00]{Waterskin}.

Flute.name: 长笛
Flute.description:
Ability: Charisma

Utilize: Play a known tune (DC 10), or improvise a song (DC 15)

Dancing Lights.name: Dancing Lights
Dancing Lights.description:
You create up to four torch-size lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover for the duration. Alternatively, you combine the four lights into one glowing Medium form that is vaguely humanlike. Whichever form you choose, each light sheds Dim Light in a 10-foot radius.

As a Bonus Action, you can move the lights up to 60 feet to a space within range. A light must be within 20 feet of another light created by this spell, and a light vanishes if it exceeds the spell’s range.

Vicious Mockery.name: 恶言相加
Vicious Mockery.description:
You unleash a string of insults laced with subtle enchantments at one creature you can see or hear within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take 1d6 Psychic damage and have Disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

Cantrip Upgrade. The damage increases by 1d6 when you reach levels 5 (2d6), 11 (3d6), and 17 (4d6).

Mocked.name: Mocked
Mocked.description: The target has Disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

Charm Person.name: 魅惑人类
Charm Person.description:
One Humanoid you can see within range makes a Wisdom saving throw. It does so with Advantage if you or your allies are fighting it. On a failed save, the target has the &Reference[charmed apply=false] condition until the spell ends or until you or your allies damage it. The Charmed creature is Friendly to you. When the spell ends, the target knows it was Charmed by you.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Charmed.name: 魅惑
Charmed.description: the target has the &Reference[charmed apply=false] condition until the spell ends or until you or your allies damage it. The Charmed creature is Friendly to you. When the spell ends, the target knows it was Charmed by you.

Color Spray.name: 七彩喷射
Color Spray.description: You launch a dazzling array of flashing, colorful light. Each creature in a 15-foot Cone originating from you must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or have the &Reference[blinded apply=false] condition until the end of your next turn.

Dissonant Whispers.name: Dissonant Whispers
Dissonant Whispers.description:
One creature of your choice that you can see within range hears a discordant melody in its mind. The target makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 3d6 Psychic damage and must immediately use its Reaction, if available, to move as far away from you as it can, using the safest route. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 1.

Healing Word.name: 治愈真言
Healing Word.description:
A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains Hit Points equal to 2d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 2d4 for each spell slot level above 1.

Bedroll.name: Bedroll
Bedroll.description: A Bedroll sleeps one Small or Medium creature. While in a Bedroll, you automatically succeed on saving throws against extreme cold (see the Dungeon Master ’s Guide).

Bell.name: Bell
Bell.description: When rung as a Utilize action, a Bell produces a sound that can be heard up to 60 feet away.

Bullseye Lantern.name: Bullseye Lantern
Bullseye Lantern.description: A bullseye lantern casts bright light in a 60-foot cone and dim light for an additional 60 feet. Once lit, it burns for 6 hours on a flask (1 pint) of oil.

Oil.name: Oil
Oil.description:
You can douse a creature, object, or space with Oil or use it as fuel, as detailed below.

Dousing a Creature or an Object. When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with throwing an Oil flask. Target one creature or object within 20 feet of yourself. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 plus your Dexterity modifier and Proficiency Bonus) or be covered in oil. If the target takes Fire damage before the oil dries (after 1 minute), the target takes an extra [[/damage 5 type=fire]] damage from burning oil.

Dousing a Space. You can take the Utilize action to pour an Oil flask on level ground to cover a 5-foot-square area within 5 feet of yourself. If lit, the oil burns until the end of the turn 2 rounds from when the oil was lit (or 12 seconds) and deals 5 Fire damage to any creature that enters the area or ends its turn there. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

Fuel. Oil serves as fuel for Lamps and Lanterns. Once lit, a flask of Oil burns for 6 hours in a Lamp or Lantern. That duration doesn’t need to be consecutive; you can extinguish the burning Oil (as a Utilize action) and rekindle it again until it has burned for a total of 6 hours.

Rations.name: 口粮
Rations.description: Rations consist of travel-ready food, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts. See “Malnutrition” in the rules glossary for the risks of not eating.

Tinderbox.name: 火绒盒
Tinderbox.description: A Tinderbox is a small container holding flint, fire steel, and tinder (usually dry cloth soaked in light oil) used to kindle a fire. Using it to light a Candle, Lamp, Lantern, or Torch—or anything else with exposed fuel—takes a Bonus Action. Lighting any other fire takes 1 minute.

Waterskin.name: Waterskin
Waterskin.description: A Waterskin holds up to 4 pints. If you don’t drink sufficient water, you risk &Reference[dehydration].

Water (Pint).name: Water (Pint)
Water (Pint).description: If you don’t drink sufficient water, you risk &Reference[dehydration].

Tiefling, Chthonic.name: Tiefling, Chthonic
Tiefling, Chthonic.description:
Tieflings are either born in the Lower Planes or have fiendish ancestors who originated there. A tiefling (pronounced TEE-fling) is linked by blood to a devil, a demon, or some other Fiend. This connection to the Lower Planes is the tiefling’s fiendish legacy, which comes with the promise of power yet has no effect on the tiefling’s moral outlook.

A tiefling chooses whether to embrace or lament their fiendish legacy.

Chthonic

Tieflings who have the chthonic legacy feel not only the tug of Carceri but also the greed of Gehenna and the gloom of Hades. Some of these tieflings look cadaverous. Others possess the unearthly beauty of a succubus, or they have physical features in common with a night hag, a yugoloth, or some other Neutral Evil fiendish ancestor.

Tiefling Traits

Creature Type: Humanoid

Size: Medium (about 4–7 feet tall) or Small (about 3–4 feet tall), chosen when you select this species

Speed: 30 feet

As a Tiefling, you have the following special traits.

Darkvision. You have Darkvision with a range of 60 feet.

Fiendish Legacy. You are the recipient of a legacy that grants you supernatural abilities.

When you reach character levels 3 and 5, you learn a higher-level spell, as shown on the table. You always have that spell prepared. You can cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to cast it in that way when you finish a Long Rest. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for the spells you cast with this trait (choose the ability when you select the legacy).

Otherworldly Presence. You know the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy} cantrip. When you cast it with this trait, the spell uses the same spellcasting ability you use for your Fiendish Legacy trait.

Fiendish Legacies
Level 1Level 3Level 5
You have Resistance to Necrotic damage.You also know the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplChillTouch]{Chill Touch} cantrip.@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFalseLife0]{False Life}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplRayofEnfee]{Ray of Enfeeblement}

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Otherworldly Presence.name: Otherworldly Presence
Otherworldly Presence.description:
You know the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy} cantrip. When you cast it with this trait, the spell uses the same spellcasting ability you use for your Fiendish legacy trait.

Foundry Note

When you're granted this spell it will allow you to choose your spellcasting ability.

Fiendish Legacy, Chthonic.name: 邪魔遗赠（幽冥）
Fiendish Legacy, Chthonic.description:
You are the recipient of a legacy that grants you supernatural abilities.

When you reach character levels 3 and 5, you learn a higher-level spell, as shown on the table. You always have that spell prepared. You can cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to cast it in that way when you finish a Long Rest. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for the spells you cast with this trait (choose the ability when you select the legacy).

Chthonic

Tieflings who have the chthonic legacy feel not only the tug of Carceri but also the greed of Gehenna and the gloom of Hades. Some of these tieflings look cadaverous. Others possess the unearthly beauty of a succubus, or they have physical features in common with a night hag, a yugoloth, or some other Neutral Evil fiendish ancestor.

Chthonic Legacy Traits
Level 1Level 3Level 5
You have Resistance to Necrotic damage.You also know the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplChillTouch]{Chill Touch} cantrip.@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFalseLife0]{False Life}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplRayofEnfee]{Ray of Enfeeblement}

Foundry Note

The Resistance and spells are granted to you automatically and you will be prompted to choose the spellcasting ability during advancement.

Entertainer.name: Entertainer
Entertainer.description:
Ability Scores: Strength, Dexterity, Charisma

Feat: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.feats.Item.phbftMusician000]{Musician}

Skill Proficiencies: Acrobatics and Performance

Tool Proficiency: Choose one kind of Musical Instrument

Equipment: Choose A or B: (A) Musical Instrument (same as above), 2 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCostume0000]{Costumes}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagMirror00000]{Mirror}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPerfume0000]{Perfume}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.SsAmWV6YBqeOFihT]{Traveler's Clothes}, 11 GP; or (B) 50 GP

You spent much of your youth following roving fairs and carnivals, performing odd jobs for musicians and acrobats in exchange for lessons. You may have learned how to walk a tightrope, how to play a lute in a distinct style, or how to recite poetry with impeccable diction. To this day, you thrive on applause and long for the stage.

Musician.name: 音乐家
Musician.description:
You gain the following benefits.

Instrument Training. You gain proficiency with three Musical Instruments of your choice.

Encouraging Song. As you finish a Short or Long Rest, you can play a song on a Musical Instrument with which you have proficiency and give Heroic Inspiration to allies who hear the song. The number of allies you can affect in this way equals your Proficiency Bonus (currently [[lookup @prof]]).

Foundry Note

This feature does not automatically grant the proficiencies. You can toggle the "Edit" mode in the "Details" tab of your sheet and click on the cog next to "Tools" underneath your Skills to choose your Musical Instrument proficiencies.

Bard.name: 吟游诗人
Bard.description:
An Inspiring Performer of Music, Dance, and Magic

Core Bard Traits

Primary Ability

Charisma

Hit Point Die

D8 per Bard level

Saving Throw Proficiencies

Dexterity and Charisma

Skill Proficiencies

Choose any 3 skills

Weapon Proficiencies

Simple weapons

Tool Proficiencies

Choose 3 Musical Instruments

Armor Training

Light armor

Starting Equipment

Choose A or B: (A) @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmLeatherArm]{Leather Armor}, 2 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepDagger0000]{Daggers}, Musical Instrument of your choice, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagEntertainer]{Entertainer's Pack}, and [[/award 19gp]]; or (B) [[/award 90GP]]

Invoking magic through music, dance, and verse, Bards are expert at inspiring others, soothing hurts, disheartening foes, and creating illusions. Bards believe the multiverse was spoken into existence and that remnants of its Words of Creation still resound and glimmer on every plane of existence. Bardic magic attempts to harness those words, which transcend any language.

Anything can inspire a new song or tale, so Bards are fascinated by almost everything. They become masters of many things, including performing music, working magic, and making jests.

A Bard's life is spent traveling, gathering lore, telling stories, and living on the gratitude of audiences, much like any other entertainer. But Bards' depth of knowledge and mastery of magic sets them apart.

A Bard's Repertoire

Does your Bard beat a drum while chanting the deeds of ancient heroes? Strum a lute while crooning romantic tunes? Perform arias of stirring power? Recite dramatic monologues from classic tragedies? Use the rhythm of a folk dance to coordinate the movement of allies in battle? Compose naughty limericks?

When you play a Bard, consider the style of artistic performance you favor, the moods you might invoke, and the themes that inspire your own creations. Are your poems inspired by moments of natural beauty, or are they brooding reflections on loss? Do you prefer lofty hymns or rowdy tavern songs? Are you drawn to laments for the fallen or celebrations of joy? Do you dance merry jigs or perform elaborate interpretive choreography? Do you focus on one style of performance or strive to master them all?

Becoming a Bard …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Bard Traits table.
  • Gain the Bard's level 1 features, which are listed in the Bard Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the following traits from the Core Bard Traits table: Hit Point Die, proficiency in one skill of your choice, proficiency with one Musical Instrument of your choice, and training with Light armor.
  • Gain the Bard's level 1 features, which are listed in the Bard Features table. See the multiclassing rules in chapter 2 to determine your available spell slots.

Chill Touch.name: 颤栗之触
Chill Touch.description:
Channeling the chill of the grave, make a melee spell attack against a target within reach. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 Necrotic damage, and it can’t regain Hit Points until the end of your next turn.

Cantrip Upgrade. The damage increases by 1d10 when you reach levels 5 (2d10), 11 (3d10), and 17 (4d10).

Blocked Healing.name: Blocked Healing
Blocked Healing.description: The target can’t regain Hit Points until the end of your next turn.

Bardic Inspiration.name: 诗人激励
Bardic Inspiration.description:
You can supernaturally inspire others through words, music, or dance. This inspiration is represented by your Bardic Inspiration die, which starts as a d6 (currently, [[lookup @scale.bard.inspiration.die]]).

Using Bardic Inspiration. As a Bonus Action, you can inspire another creature within 60 feet of yourself who can see or hear you. That creature gains one of your Bardic Inspiration dice. A creature can have only one Bardic Inspiration die at a time.

Once within the next hour when the creature fails a D20 Test, the creature can roll the Bardic Inspiration die and add the number rolled to the d20, potentially turning the failure into a success. A Bardic Inspiration die is expended when it's rolled.

Number of Uses. You can confer a Bardic Inspiration die a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

At Higher Levels. Your Bardic Inspiration die changes when you reach certain Bard levels, as shown in the Bardic Die column of the Bard Features table. The die becomes a d8 at level 5, a d10 at level 10, and a d12 at level 15.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect for tracking when a character has Bardic Inspiration to use.

Recovery is set to long rest (for levels before @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrdFontOfInsp]{Font of Inspiration} is gained). Please manually adjust as required.

Inspired.name: Inspired
Inspired.description: You have received Bardic Inspiration. Once within the next hour when you fail a D20 Test, you can roll the Bardic Inspiration die and add the number rolled to the d20, potentially turning the failure into a success. A Bardic Inspiration die is expended when it's rolled.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
You have learned to cast spells through your bardic arts. See @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{chapter 7} for the rules on spellcasting. The information below details how you use those rules with Bard spells, which appear in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.wwia6Wwo4BgE9GSI]{Bard spell list}.

Cantrips. You know two cantrips of your choice from the Bard spell list. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDancingLig]{Dancing Lights} and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplViciousMoc]{Vicious Mockery} are recommended.

Whenever you gain a Bard level, you can replace one of your cantrips with another cantrip of your choice from the Bard spell list.

When you reach Bard levels 4 and 10, you learn another cantrip of your choice from the Bard spell list, as shown in the Cantrips column of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbBard000000000.JournalEntryPage.V8pqIWlaL9GhY61t#class-features]{Bard Features} table.

Spell Slots. The Bard Features table shows how many spell slots you have to cast your level 1+ spells. You regain all expended slots when you finish a Long Rest.

Prepared Spells of Level 1+. You prepare the list of level 1+ spells that are available for you to cast with this feature. To start, choose four level 1 spells from the Bard spell list. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmPerso]{Charm Person}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplColorSpray]{Color Spray}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDissonantW]{Dissonant Whispers}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHealingWor]{Healing Word} are recommended.

The number of spells on your list increases as you gain Bard levels, as shown in the Prepared Spells column of the Bard Features table. Whenever that number increases, choose additional spells from the Bard spell list until the number of spells on your list matches the number on the table. The chosen spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots. For example, if you're a level 3 Bard, your list of prepared spells can include six spells of levels 1 and 2 in any combination.

If another Bard feature gives you spells that you always have prepared, those spells don't count against the number of spells you can prepare with this feature, but those spells otherwise count as Bard spells for you.

Changing Your Prepared Spells. Whenever you gain a Bard level, you can replace one spell on your list with another Bard spell for which you have spell slots.

Spellcasting Ability. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for your Bard spells.

Spellcasting Focus. You can use a Musical Instrument as a Spellcasting Focus for your Bard spells.

Cleric.name: Cleric
Cleric.description:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCreatingAChar.JournalEntryPage.5ay66aAVgkgRH7qH]{Step 1: Choose a Class}
ClassLikesPrimary AbilityComplexity

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCreatingAChar.JournalEntryPage.9o8NbQ1Ph2xCxlQh]{Step 3: Determine Ability Scores}

GoodHelpful

biography.value:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCreatingAChar.JournalEntryPage.5ay66aAVgkgRH7qH]{Step 1: Choose a Class}
ClassLikesPrimary AbilityComplexity
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCleric0000000]{Cleric}GodsWisdomAverage

BackgroundSpeciesLanguages

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbclcCleric0000]{Cleric}14813101512

AlignmentPersonality
LawfulLoyal
GoodHelpful

Guard.name: Guard
Guard.description:
Ability Scores: Strength, Intelligence, Wisdom

Feat: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.feats.Item.phbftAlert000000]{Alert}

Skill Proficiencies: Athletics and Perception

Tool Proficiency: Choose one kind of Gaming Set

Equipment: Choose A or B: (A) @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepSpear00000]{Spear}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLightCross]{Light Crossbow}, 20 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbamoBolts00000]{Bolts}, Gaming Set (same as above), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.wjHtGnd05SPdURqE]{Hooded Lantern}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagManacles000]{Manacles}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagQuiver00000]{Quiver}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.SsAmWV6YBqeOFihT]{Traveler's Clothes}, 12 GP; or (B) 50 GP

Your feet ache when you remember the countless hours you spent at your post in the tower. You were trained to keep one eye looking outside the wall, watching for marauders sweeping from the nearby forest, and your other eye looking inside the wall, searching for cutpurses and troublemakers.

Alert.name: Alert
Alert.description:
You gain the following benefits.

Initiative Proficiency. When you roll Initiative, you can add your Proficiency Bonus to the roll.

Initiative Swap. Immediately after you roll Initiative, you can swap your Initiative with the Initiative of one willing ally in the same combat. You can’t make this swap if you or the ally has the &Reference[Incapacitated] condition.

Foundry Note

This feature automatically includes the bonus to your Initiative.

Dwarf.name: Dwarf
Dwarf.description:
Dwarves were raised from the earth in the elder days by a deity of the forge. Called by various names on different worlds—Moradin, Reorx, and others—that god gave dwarves an affinity for stone and metal and for living underground. The god also made them resilient like the mountains, with a life span of about 350 years.

Squat and often bearded, the original dwarves carved cities and strongholds into mountainsides and under the earth. Their oldest legends tell of conflicts with the monsters of mountaintops and the Underdark, whether those monsters were towering giants or subterranean horrors. Inspired by those tales, dwarves of any culture often sing of valorous deeds—especially of the little overcoming the mighty.

On some worlds in the multiverse, the first settlements of dwarves were built in hills or mountains, and the families who trace their ancestry to those settlements call themselves hill dwarves or mountain dwarves, respectively. The Greyhawk and Dragonlance settings have such communities.

Dwarf Traits

Creature Type: Humanoid

Size: Medium (about 4–5 feet tall)

Speed: 30 feet

As a Dwarf, you have these special traits.

Darkvision. You have Darkvision with a range of 120 feet.

Dwarven Resilience. You have Resistance to Poison damage. You also have Advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the Poisoned condition.

Dwarven Toughness. Your Hit Point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 again whenever you gain a level.

Stonecunning. As a Bonus Action, you gain Tremorsense with a range of 60 feet for 10 minutes. You must be on a stone surface or touching a stone surface to use this Tremorsense. The stone can be natural or worked.You can use this Bonus Action a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

Dwarven Resilience.name: Dwarven Resilience
Dwarven Resilience.description:
You have Resistance to Poison damage. You also have Advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the Poisoned condition.

Foundry Note

You will automatically be granted Resistance to Poison damage but not Advantage on saving throws to avoid/end the Poisoned condition.

Dwarven Toughness.name: Dwarven Toughness
Dwarven Toughness.description:
Your Hit Point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 again whenever you gain a level.

Foundry Note

The Hit Point maximum increase is handled automatically each level.

Stonecunning.name: Stonecunning
Stonecunning.description:
As a Bonus Action, you gain &Reference[Tremorsense] with a range of 60 feet for 10 minutes. You must be on a stone surface or touching a stone surface to use this Tremorsense. The stone can be natural or worked. You can use this Bonus Action a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

This feature includes the limited uses and an Active Effect that grants you the 60 feet of Tremorsense. It does not automatically update your Token's vision settings though.

Case, Crossbow Bolt.name: Case, Crossbow Bolt
Case, Crossbow Bolt.description: A Crossbow Bolt Case holds up to 20 Bolts.

Dragonchess.name: Dragonchess
Dragonchess.description:
Ability: Wisdom

Utilize: Discern whether someone is cheating (DC 10), or win the game (DC 20)

Hooded Lantern.name: Hooded Lantern
Hooded Lantern.description: A hooded lantern casts bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. Once lit, it burns for 6 hours on a flask (1 pint) of oil. As an action, you can lower the hood, reducing the light to dim light in a 5-foot radius.

Manacles.name: Manacles
Manacles.description:
As a Utilize action, you can use Manacles to bind an unwilling Small or Medium creature within 5 feet of yourself that has the &Reference[Grappled], &Reference[Incapacitated], or &Reference[Restrained] condition if you succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check. While bound, a creature has Disadvantage on attack rolls, and the creature is Restrained if the Manacles are attached to a chain or hook that is fixed in place. Escaping the Manacles requires a successful DC 20 Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check as an action. Bursting them requires a successful DC 25 Strength (Athletics) check as an action.

Each set of Manacles comes with a key. Without the key, a creature can use Thieves’ Tools to pick the Manacles’ lock with a successful [[/tool thief dex 15]] check.

Traveler's Clothes.name: Traveler's Clothes
Traveler's Clothes.description: A set of clothes worn by travellers.

Shield.name: 盾牌
Shield.description: You gain the Armor Class benefit of a Shield only if you have training with it.

Guidance.name: Guidance
Guidance.description: You touch a willing creature and choose a skill. Until the spell ends, the creature adds 1d4 to any ability check using the chosen skill.

Sacred Flame.name: Sacred Flame
Sacred Flame.description:
Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 Radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from Half Cover or Three-Quarters Cover for this save.

Cantrip Upgrade. The damage increases by 1d8 when you reach levels 5 (2d8), 11 (3d8), and 17 (4d8).

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Bless.name: 祝福术
Bless.description:
You bless up to three creatures within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Blessed.name: Blessed
Blessed.description: Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.

Cure Wounds.name: 疗伤术
Cure Wounds.description:
A creature you touch regains a number of Hit Points equal to 2d8 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 2d8 for each spell slot level above 1.

Guiding Bolt.name: 光导箭
Guiding Bolt.description:
You hurl a bolt of light toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, it takes 4d6 Radiant damage, and the next attack roll made against it before the end of your next turn has Advantage.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot.The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 1.

Guiding Bolt.name: 光导箭
Guiding Bolt.description: The next attack roll made against the target before the end of your next turn has Advantage.

Shield of Faith.name: 虔诚护盾
Shield of Faith.description: A shimmering field surrounds a creature of your choice within range, granting it a +2 bonus to AC for the duration.

Shimmering Field.name: Shimmering Field
Shimmering Field.description: The target gains a +2 bonus to AC for the duration.

Amulet.name: 护符
Amulet.description:
Usage Requirement: Worn or held

A @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagHolySymbolV]{Holy Symbol} takes one of the forms in the Holy Symbol table and is bejeweled or painted to channel divine magic. A Cleric or Paladin can use a Holy Symbol as a Spellcasting Focus.

Priest’s Pack.name: 祭司套组
Priest’s Pack.description: A Priest’s Pack contains the following items: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBackpack000]{Backpack}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBlanket0000]{Blanket}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagHolyWater00]{Holy Water}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagLamp0000000]{Lamp}, 7 days of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRations0000]{Rations}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRobe0000000]{Robe}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00]{Tinderbox}.

Blanket.name: Blanket
Blanket.description: While wrapped in a blanket, you have Advantage on saving throws against extreme cold (see the Dungeon Master ’s Guide).

Holy Water.name: Holy Water
Holy Water.description: When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with throwing a flask of Holy Water. Target one creature you can see within 20 feet of yourself. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 plus your Dexterity modifier and Proficiency Bonus) or take 2d8 Radiant damage if it is a Fiend or an Undead.

Lamp.name: Lamp
Lamp.description: A Lamp burns @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000]{Oil} as fuel to cast Bright Light in a 15-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 30 feet.

Rations.name: Rations
Rations.description: Rations consist of travel-ready food, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts. See “Malnutrition” in the rules glossary for the risks of not eating.

Robe.name: Robe
Robe.description: A Robe has vocational or ceremonial significance. Some events and locations admit only people wearing a Robe bearing certain colors or symbols.

Tinderbox.name: 火绒盒
Tinderbox.description: A Tinderbox is a small container holding flint, fire steel, and tinder (usually dry cloth soaked in light oil) used to kindle a fire. Using it to light a Candle, Lamp, Lantern, or Torch—or anything else with exposed fuel—takes a Bonus Action. Lighting any other fire takes 1 minute.

Cleric.name: 牧师
Cleric.description:
A Miraculous Priest of Divine Power

Core Cleric Traits

Primary Ability

Wisdom

Hit Point Die

D8 per Cleric level

Saving Throw Proficiencies

Wisdom and Charisma

Skill Proficiencies

Choose 2: History, Insight, Medicine, Persuasion, or Religion

Weapon Proficiencies

Simple weapons

Armor Training

Light and Medium armor and Shields

Starting Equipment

Choose A or B: (A) @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmChainShirt]{Chain Shirt}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmShield0000]{Shield}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepMace000000]{Mace}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagHolySymbolV]{Holy Symbol}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPriestsPack]{Priest's Pack}, and [[/award 7GP]]; or (B) [[/award 110GP]]

Clerics draw power from the realms of the gods and harness it to work miracles. Blessed by a deity, a pantheon, or another immortal entity, a Cleric can reach out to the divine magic of the Outer Planes—where gods dwell—and channel it to bolster people and battle foes.

Because their power is a divine gift, Clerics typically associate themselves with temples dedicated to the deity or other immortal force that unlocked their magic. Harnessing divine magic doesn't rely on specific training, yet Clerics might learn prayers and rites that help them draw on power from the Outer Planes.

Not every member of a temple or shrine is a Cleric. Some priests are called to a simple life of temple service, carrying out their devotion through prayer and rituals, not through magic. Many mortals claim to speak for the gods, but few can marshal the power of those gods the way a Cleric can.

Becoming a Cleric …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Cleric Traits table.
  • Gain the Cleric's level 1 features, which are listed in the Cleric Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the following traits from the Core Cleric Traits table: Hit Point Die and training with Light and Medium armor and Shields.
  • Gain the Cleric's level 1 features, which are listed in the Cleric Features table. See the multiclassing rules in chapter 2 to determine your available spell slots.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
You have learned to cast spells through prayer and meditation. See @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{chapter 7} for the rules on spellcasting. The information below details how you use those rules with Cleric spells, which appear on the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.SkHptN2PTzFGDaEj]{Cleric spell list}.

Cantrips. You know three cantrips of your choice from the Cleric spell list. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGuidance00]{Guidance}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSacredFlam]{Sacred Flame}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy} are recommended.

Whenever you gain a Cleric level, you can replace one of your cantrips with another cantrip of your choice from the Cleric spell list.

When you reach Cleric levels 4 and 10, you learn another cantrip of your choice from the Cleric spell list, as shown in the Cantrips column of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbCleric0000000.JournalEntryPage.acPyA6A4DQBSnuZB#class-features]{Cleric Features} table.

Spell Slots. The Cleric Features table shows how many spell slots you have to cast your level 1+ spells. You regain all expended slots when you finish a Long Rest.

Prepared Spells of Level 1+. You prepare the list of level 1+ spells that are available for you to cast with this feature. To start, choose four level 1 spells from the Cleric spell list. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBless00000]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGuidingBol]{Guiding Bolt}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShieldofFa]{Shield of Faith} are recommended.

The number of spells on your list increases as you gain Cleric levels, as shown in the Prepared Spells column of the Cleric Features table. Whenever that number increases, choose additional spells from the Cleric spell list until the number of spells on your list matches the number on the table. The chosen spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots. For example, if you're a level 3 Cleric, your list of prepared spells can include six spells of levels 1 and 2 in any combination.

If another Cleric feature gives you spells that you always have prepared, those spells don't count against the number of spells you can prepare with this feature, but those spells otherwise count as Cleric spells for you.

Changing Your Prepared Spells. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can change your list of prepared spells, replacing any of the spells there with other Cleric spells for which you have spell slots.

Spellcasting Ability. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for your Cleric spells.

Spellcasting Focus. You can use a Holy Symbol as a Spellcasting Focus for your Cleric spells.

Divine Order.name: Divine Order
Divine Order.description:
You have dedicated yourself to one of the following sacred roles of your choice.

Protector. Trained for battle, you gain proficiency with Martial weapons and training with Heavy armor.

Thaumaturge. You know one extra cantrip from the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.SkHptN2PTzFGDaEj]{Cleric spell list}. In addition, your mystical connection to the divine gives you a bonus to your Intelligence (Arcana or Religion) checks. The bonus equals your Wisdom modifier (minimum of +1).

Foundry Note

During advancement you will be able to choose which option you prefer.

Divine Order: Protector.name: Divine Order: Protector
Divine Order: Protector.description:
You have dedicated yourself to the following sacred role:

Protector. Trained for battle, you gain proficiency with Martial weapons and training with Heavy armor.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which grants the proficiency and training.

Druid.name: 德鲁伊
Druid.description:
